new_posts.title: Assigning GitHub Copilot to an issue now adds you as an assignee
new_posts.summary: When you assign an issue to Copilot, you’ll now automatically be added as an assignee yourself. This makes it easier to track your work using filters like assignee:@me and understand…</

new_posts.title: GitHub Advanced Security trials now available for more GitHub Enterprise customers
new_posts.summary: More GitHub Enterprise customers can now start a self-serve GitHub Advanced Security trial to evaluate GitHub Code Security and GitHub Secret Protection. Enterprises that have previously completed

new_posts.title: GitHub Copilot now supports Agent Skills
new_posts.summary: You can now create Agent Skills to teach Copilot how to perform specialized tasks in a specific, repeatable way. Agent Skills are folders containing instructions, scripts, and resources that Copilo

new_posts.title: Claude Opus 4.5 is now generally available in GitHub Copilot
new_posts.summary: Claude Opus 4.5 is generally available to Copilot Enterprise, Copilot Business, Copilot Pro, and Copilot Pro+. You’ll now be able to access the model in GitHub Copilot Chat on github.com,R

new_posts.title: GitHub Enterprise Cloud data residency in Japan is generally available
new_posts.summary: GitHub Enterprise Cloud with data residency in Japan is now generally available, allowing GitHub Enterprise Cloud customers greater flexibility in choosing where their code and repository data are

new_posts.title: Copilot code review preview features now supported in GitHub Enterprise Cloud with data residency
new_posts.summary: GitHub Enterprise Cloud with data residency now supports Copilot code review preview features, providing you an opportunity to try the latest agentic code review capabilities in your pull requests.

new_posts.title: Enterprise-level pull request activity now included in Copilot Usage Metrics in public preview
new_posts.summary: You can now view pull request–level activity metrics for your enterprise—including overall pull request creation and review activity—as well as how GitHub Copilot participates in
